room_title: Escape room "Bugsy's Nightmare" by Xterious Escape in Las Vegas
room_address: 105 E Reno Ave, Suite 1, Las Vegas, NV 89119
room_description: It’s 1945, Las Vegas, Nevada. Bugsy, the dangerous criminal, got a hold of the secret prints of Las Vegas that would allow him to rule the city. Now he is gone for an hour. This is the only chance to recover the prints and save the city’s future. Time is of the essence you must find his safe, get the documents and leave the place before he gets back. If Bugsy finds you there he will kill you all and take over the city for good...
